name: Heliclimbers
description:
Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #9 Theme: CLIMBING

The city is filled with zombies. Luckily, you are a pilot who has a helicopter with a rope! Help other people escape from zombies.

Controls
  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Space to deploy/fold the rope
  • R to restart
  • ESC to exit
How to play
  • Evacuate people to get points.
  • Collect jerrycan to get fuel.
  • If you evacuate zombies, you will lose fuel.
  • If you run out of fuel, the game will over.
Game tips
  • Red platforms do not allow people and zombies to climb the rope.
  • The arrow around the helicopter indicates the nearest people.
  • Throw zombies down to kill and to get points.

Assets were used: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Thanks for playing our game UwU
Authors: D4rkof, exxcsme, Simon Kot
